details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Gigas Wave - Reinforce and Bonus Attack
  • Wing Beat - Pummel, Extra Attack and Reinforce

extraContent.title: Morph Gauge
extraContent.content:
Kaisers have a special gauge called Morph Gauge that grants special bonus stats. When the gauge is fully filled, Kaiser can transform into his ultimate form (in 3rd Job and 4th Job). Kaiser's Morph Gauge charges up as he attacks

Additionally, Kaiser can use command inputs to activate certain attacks using Dragon Link. Using command input skills will charge the Morph Gauge faster and the attack will deal more damage. Below is a list of all commands:

Flame Surge (1st Job): Attack ->

Impact Wave (2nd Job): -> Up Arrow +

Wing Beat (3rd Job): -> Jump +

Gigas Wave (4th Job): ->

Dragon Barrage (4th Job): -> Left Arrow/Right Arrow +

Blade Burst (4th Job): -> Down Arrow +

Lastly, Kaiser has two beginner toggle buffs called Realign: Defender Mode and Realign: Attacker Mode. These two buffs are upgraded as you level up and gain new skills

primary.name: Realign: Defender Mode
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +200
details: Cannot be combined with

primary.name: Realign: Attacker Mode
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +5, Critical Rate: +3%, Boss Damage: +3%
details: Cannot be combined with

primary.name: Vertical Grapple
primary.shortDesc: Press the skill key while you're climbing to cancel.
primary.desc: Grapples onto a platform above and launches you up
details: Pressing the Jump Key while launching up will cancel the grapple early

primary.name: Transfiguration
primary.shortDesc: Stage 1: Attack Speed: +1, Speed: +5, Jump: +10, Power Stance Chance: 20%\nStage 2: Attack Speed: +1, Speed: +10, Jump: +20, Power Stance Chance: +40%
primary.desc: As you charge your Morph Gauge, you gain bonus effects
details: Bonuses from each stage do not stack

primary.name: Dragon Link
primary.shortDesc: Morph Gauge fills faster, and the Dragon Link skill and the Kaiser attack skill that follows will have their final damage increased by 15%. Once used, any buff that increases the final damage of following attack will disappear regardless of the skill. Does not apply to Wing Beat.
primary.desc: Allows you to use Attack Commands by combining this Skill Key with a unique combination of Keys
details: Activating skills using Attack Commands will charge the Morph Gauge faster and the attack will deal more damage

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Guardian's Return
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100\nCooldown: 600 sec
primary.desc: Returns you to Pantheon, Kaiser's hometown

primary.name: Dragon Slash
primary.shortDesc:
1-hit: Attack up to 8 enemies for 70% damage 3 times
2-hit: Up to 6 enemies attack for 50% damage 5 times
3-hit: Up to 6 enemies attack for 60% damage 5 times
Final Form: Up to 8 enemies attack for 160% damage 5 times, Up to 10 enemies attack 6 times after 4th job
primary.desc: Attacks in front of you consecutively up to 3 times

primary.name: Flame Surge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Damage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Launches fireballs forward towards nearby enemies
details: [Combo]: (then) ->

primary.name: Air Lift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Set Jump Distance, Max Speed: +20, Speed: +20
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Scale Skin
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +200, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Dragon Slash I
primary.shortDesc: Additional 40% bonus to Dragon Slash damage
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Impact Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 17, Damage: 270%, Mobs Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Send out a shockwave in front of you
details: [Combo]: -> Up Arrow (together) +

primary.name: Piercing Blaze
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Monsters Hit: 12, Damage: 250%, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 2 sec
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies back
details: Has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Tempest Blades
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Swords Summoned: 3. Use the skill again after summoning to send the swords at the enemy and deal 300% damage with 3 attacks.\nCooldown: 10 sec\nFinal Form: Number of Attacks: +1
primary.desc: Summons swords that hover above your head
details: Pressing the Skill Key again causes the swords to seek out enemies in range
Prioritizes enemies with the highest Max HP first

primary.name: Blaze On
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 240 sec, Attack Power: +20, Attack Speed: +2
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages) and grants flat Attack

primary.name: Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Two-Handed Sword Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Defender Mode I
primary.shortDesc: Defense: Additional +200
details: Increases DEF provided

primary.name: Attacker Mode I
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +10, Critical Rate: +2%, Boss Damage: +5%
details: Increases Attack, %Crit Rate, and %Boss Damage provided

primary.name: Dragon Slash II
primary.shortDesc: Additional 70% bonus to Dragon Slash damage
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Wing Beat
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 40, Chance to Slow Attacked Monsters: 40%\nDissipates when certain number of attacks are made, set distance is traveled, or duration expires.
primary.desc: Creates a whirlwind that damages enemies it collides with
details: [Combo]: -> Jump +
Up to 2 whirlwinds can be active at once
The whirlwind will disappear after a set distance or when the duration expires
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Pressure Chain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Penetrates then pulls 8 enemies dealing 280% damage 2 times, Stun Chance: 95%
primary.desc: Launches your sword forward while pulling in enemies with a chance to stun

primary.name: Final Form
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 60, Final Damage: +10%, Power Stance Chance: +100%. Ignores enemies' attack-ignoring and attack-reflecting effects.\nAfter 4th Job Advancement: Final Damage: +15%
primary.desc: Transforms you into your true form
details:
All your attacks will be enhanced and you gain increased %Final Damage, %Crit Rate and 100% Knockback Resistance
  • In 4th Job, the bonus effects become stronger
While transformed, your attacks ignore Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
You can teleport a short distance by the Skill Key and an Arrow Key for the direction you want to go together

primary.name: Stone Dragon
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Summon Duration: 60 sec, Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 400%, Slow Chance: 75%, Slow Duration: 3 sec
primary.desc: Summons a dragon statue that attacks and pulls in nearby enemies
details: Also has a chance to slow enemies hit
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Cursebite
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 240 sec, Status Resistance: +60, Elemental Resistance: +60%\nFinal Damage against monsters with Abnormal Status increases by 15%.
primary.desc: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance, %Elemental Resistance
details: Additionally increases %Final Damage towards enemies with Abnormal Statuses

primary.name: Catalyze
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30%, Critical Rate: +20%, Final Damage: +20%

primary.name: Self Recovery
primary.shortDesc: Every 4 sec, restores 5% HP and MP even in combat.

primary.name: Defender Mode II
primary.shortDesc: Defense: Additional +200\n3% of max HP restored when using Dragon Link skills.
details: Increases DEF provided
Now when toggled, attacks activated using will restore some %Max HP

primary.name: Attacker Mode II
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +15, Critical Rate: +5%, Boss Damage: +5%\nFinal Damage additionally increased by 5% when using Dragon Link skills.
details: Increases Attack, %Crit Rate, and %Boss Damage provided
Now when toggled, attacks activated using gain increased %Final Damage

primary.name: Dragon Slash III
primary.shortDesc: Additional 90% bonus to Dragon Slash damage
details: Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Gigas Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 9\nFinal Form: MP Cost: 60, Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 11
primary.desc: Unleashes a flurry of attacks on a single enemy
details: [Combo]: ->
Enemies hit are slowed

primary.name: Dragon Barrage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 7\nFinal Form: MP Cost: 60, Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 9.\nCooldown: 5 sec.
primary.desc: Dash forward leaving an exploding trail behind you
details:
[Combo]: -> Left Arrow/Right Arrow +
  • Arrow Key you press is the opposite of the direction you are facing

primary.name: Blade Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Mobs Hit: 12, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 5. Explosion damage hits 12 enemies for 225% damage 4 times.
primary.desc: Swords strike down on enemies and explode on your location
details: [Combo]: -> Down Arrow +
Can be used in the air

primary.name: Inferno Breath
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 15. Creates several fire trails afterwards.\nFire trail periodically inflicts 200% damage up to 6 enemies for 20 sec.\nCooldown: 20 sec
primary.desc: Summons a dragon that breaths fire on enemies. The attack leaves a trail of fire that damages enemies
details: Ignores Damage Reflect

primary.name: Advanced Tempest Blade
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Number of Your Swords Summoned: 5. Use the skill again after summoning to send the swords at the enemy and deal 450% damage with 4 attacks.
Cooldown: 10 sec
Permanently Increase Attack Power: +20
Final Form: Number of Attacks: +1
details: Increases %Damage, number of hits, and number of swords summoned
Now grants flat Attack

primary.name: Grand Armor
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: MP 10% of Max MP, Duration: 15 sec. Damage taken, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP, is reduced by 12%.\nCooldown: 120 sec.\n[Passive Effect - Damage Taken: -20%, Knockback Resistance: +60%]
primary.desc: Increases %Damage Reduction including %Max HP attacks
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage Reudction (Regular Monsters) and %Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Unbreakable Will
primary.shortDesc: 40% monster DEF ignored

primary.name: Expert Sword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Two-Handed Sword Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack, %Crit Rate, and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Nova Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Nova Temperance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Defender Mode III
primary.shortDesc: Defense: Additional +200\nDamage Reduction During Final Form: 5% (including Percentage HP attacks)
details: Increases DEF provided
Now when toggled, while in , gain increased %Damage Reduction (including %Max HP attacks)

primary.name: Attacker Mode III
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +15, Critical Rate: +10%, Boss Damage: +5%\nDamage additionally increased by 10% when attacking Boss Monsters in Final Form mode.
details: Increases Attack, %Crit Rate, and %Boss Damage provided
Now when toggled, when in , gain increased %Boss Damage

hyperActive.name: Kaiser's Majesty
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Cooldowns Reset, Duration: 30 sec, ATT +30, Attack Speed +1. Negates enemy's Attack Ignore and Attack Reflect effects\nCooldown: 90 sec. Hyper Skill cooldowns not reset.
hyperActive.desc: Increases Attack, Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and attacks will ignore Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect effects
details: Resets cooldowns of 1st - 4th Job skills

hyperActive.name: Ancestral Prominence
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 15. Invincible during casting.\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a powerful explosion that blows up enemies on screen
details: You are invincible while casting

hyperActive.name: Final Trance
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Transforms into Final Form for 60 sec.\nCooldown: 300 sec
hyperActive.desc: Immediately transforms you into Final Form

fifthMain.name: Nova Guardians
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 42 sec, summons 3 Kaisers with limited movement range. After Kaisers are summoned, use the skill again to bring them to your location. Can be used once every 10 seconds.
Kaiser VI - Attacks up to 10 enemies for 825% damage 4 times.
Kaiser XV - Attacks up to 10 enemies for 500% damage 6 times.
Kaiser XXVII - Attacks up to 10 enemies for 1775% damage 2 times.
.Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summons previous Kaiser knights to fight by your side
details: Pressing the Skill Key again while the summons are active will move them to your location
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Bladefall
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, each blade strikes for 1000% damage 4 times and creates a pool of magma where it lands after 2 sec.
The magma hits up to 12 enemies dealing 1400% damage 6 times and increases up to 2000% in proportion to the time the blade remained in the ground after landing.
Ignores Draco Surge's cooldown 3 time(s).
Cooldown: 30 sec
Final Form: Tempest Blades and magma's attack counts increase by 1.
fifthMain.desc: Your Tempest Blades seek out enemies and slam into the ground at their location
details: must be active in order to use skill

Pressing the skill key again will release the swords causing an explosion
  • The explosion will deal more damage the longer it stays in the ground
Ignores Draco Surge's cooldown (up to 3 times)
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Draco Surge
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 10. After that, launches the Dragon Warrant, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 8. Additional Critical rate: +100%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +50%
Final Form: Increases Draco Wave's attack count by 2
Activates upon using Gigas Wave
Cooldown: 6 sec
fifthMain.desc: Periodically enhances becoming Draco Surge that launches an additional attack
details: Has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Dragonflare
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Deal automatic attacks to up to 8 surrounding enemies for 750% damage 6 times periodically for 20 sec.
Fire Energy: Maintained 5 sec. Upon detonation, the Fire Energy and surroundings near Kaiser will attack up to 10 enemies for 900% damage 6 time(s). Explosion Cooldown: 3.6 sec
Fire Orb: 6 Forms Fire Orb(s) that attack for 700% damage 3 time(s). Re-creation Cooldown: 10 sec
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Flames surround you that damages enemies caught in it
details:
[Passive]: While skill is on cooldown, your attacks create homing fireballs similar to
  • Right-clicking the skill will turn the fireballs ON/OFF

While active, a haze is left at places you pass through
  • Attacks in these haze cause it to explode, damaging nearby enemies
Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the skill
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Kaiser is STR warrior class part of the Nova class group. Kaisers have a special gauge called Morph Gauge that grants special bonus stats. When the gauge is fully filled, Kaiser can transform into his ultimate form (in 3rd Job and 4th Job). Kaiser's Morph Gauge charges up as he attacks
